meanings.def: a way of life, an attitude, an idea, etc. that has become very popular
a small group of people who have extreme religious beliefs and who are not part of any established religion
examples: Their son ran away from home and joined a cult.
the members of a religious cult

meanings.def: a system of religious beliefs and practices
examples: the Chinese cult of ancestor worship

meanings.def: very popular with a particular group of people
examples: The singer has become a cult figure in America.
The cartoon has achieved cult status.
The TV series has a cult following among young people.
The book achieved cult status as soon as it was published.
The show has built up a cult following.
